bartender.name: Mira
bartender.description: A stout woman with a weathered face and quick eyes. She wears an apron over sturdy clothes.
bartender.dialogue_sample: What can I get you, traveler?

merchant.name: Aldric
merchant.personality: cunning, always looking for a deal
merchant.description: A sharp-dressed man with keen eyes and a calculating smile. He constantly adjusts his merchant's scales.
merchant.dialogue_sample: Looking for something special? I might have just the thing...

shopkeeper.name: Thom
shopkeeper.personality: cheerful, helpful, loves talking to customers
shopkeeper.description: A stocky man with a round face and a permanent friendly smile. His hands are always busy organizing inventory.
shopkeeper.dialogue_sample: Welcome, friend! Can I interest you in anything?
